title: [Large-scale] Transformative Learning Design in Higher Education Institutions through Dialectical Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Leadership Theories and Organizational Learning Experience, Understanding of Higher Education Environments
context.additional_context: Practical learning-focused program for corporate training officers and leadership development practitioners, utilizing real-world case studies

learning_goals: Participants can apply core concepts of dialectical leadership (acceptance of paradox, integrative thinking) in practice.
Participants can propose innovative solutions using a paradoxical mindset in organizational conflict situations.
Participants can present plans for designing transformative learning environments in educational institutions/companies through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
